title: The Castle
occurrences: Of course. This village belongs to the castle and if one is spending the night in the village he is considered to be spending the night in the castle.
I'm Schwarzer. Son of castellan of the castle.
According to our rules special permission from the castle is required to play different music.
Sure. But aren't they going to stay here with you in the castle?
Are you going to the castle?
You see... I was going to the castle and got a bit tired. I decided to come in and warm myself... to rest...
Is she from the castle?
Get the leigh, we'll go to the castle.
That's impossible. It's not allowed to go to the castle without a special call.
May the Land-Surveyor with his two assistants go to the castle tomorrow morning?
When can my master go to the castle?
as you know, you have been accepted in castle's service
You wanted to go to the castle right from the Inn.
I usually go to the castle only in the morning.
Unfortunately, that's impossible. The Hotel is only for the sires from the castle.
I'd like to draw your attention to the fact that I have notable connections in the castle
I'd be glad to come forward to you but the sires from the castle are very finicky
Klamm's henchmen. I've told him many times to leave them at the castle.
Many years ago there was a question from the castle whether we need a land surveyor.
Exactly. He began to meddle to my correspondence with the castle.
He wouldn't have accomplished anything if not for his wife who serves at the castle.
Why do you get so angry? I will inform the castle about everything, and perhaps we will think of something for you.
I don't want a bribe from the castle. I want to receive what's rightfully mine.
Haven't you been in the castle yet?
Klamm, who waits for news from me, is sitting in the castle whole day but you are busy with your stinking cylinders!
Sisters give you their regards, especially Olga. It's she who's delivered a letter from the castle.
Perhaps, spies are deliberately sent from the castle to bother
Let's go away from here; Where there's no castle, no Klamm, no assistants, just you and me.
Cylinders my father made are used in all music boxes, even in the castle.
I know. When father's in trouble he always asks mother and she goes to the castle.
Vallabne. That's very important clerk from the castle, more important than Klamm.
Our father was one of the most prominent men in the village, he was making cylinders for the music boxes for the castle
He non-stop wrote letters to castle asking for meeting with Vallabne but no result.
I always knew his wife had good connections in the castle.
It is recommended for very important sires from the castle.
who is deliberately assigned by the castle to...
All your features are noble, prefect. It's like curves of the castle.
We will live in the castle, here's 2 letters from Klamm...
- To the castle? - Yes. So, you agree?
That's not the castle.
Why not a castle? That's real castle.
I was summoned to the castle to be land surveyor and I demand, do you hear me, I demand...
